Return Data.scenario_name: 2008 Financial Crisis Replay - 30-day stress period with correlation breakdown and liquidity constraints based on Lehman Brothers collapse and subsequent market turmoil
Return Data.liquidity_impact: Severe liquidity constraints with credit markets freezing, equity bid-ask spreads widening by 200-400%, FX swap costs increasing substantially, and flight-to-quality reducing liquidity in risk assets while increasing it in government bonds
